user.title: TRMNL Weather Station Setup
user.description:
**Step 1 of 2: Basic Configuration**

Configure the essential settings for your TRMNL display. You'll need your webhook URL and a CO₂ sensor.

data_description.url: Your TRMNL webhook URL (starts with https://)
data_description.co2_sensor: Select your air quality CO₂ sensor from available sensors
data_description.co2_name: Name to display on TRMNL (e.g., 'Office CO₂', 'Living Room')
data_description.update_interval: How often to send data to TRMNL in seconds

sensors.title: Additional Weather Sensors
sensors.description:
**Step 2 of 2: Optional Sensors**

Add up to 6 additional weather sensors (temperature, humidity, pressure, etc.). All sensors in this step are optional - you can skip any you don't need.

data_description.sensor_1: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor
data_description.sensor_2: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor
data_description.sensor_3: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor
data_description.sensor_4: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor
data_description.sensor_5: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor
data_description.sensor_6: Optional: Select a temperature, humidity, or other weather sensor

error.invalid_url: Invalid URL format. Must start with http:// or https://
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to TRMNL. Please check your webhook URL.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: TRMNL Weather Station is already configured for this webhook URL.

Modify your TRMNL Weather Station configuration. You can change sensors, display names, or update frequency.
